data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during KOMEET cruise from Hellevoetsluis to Freetown started at 1819-07-28
Ship: Komeet (Korvet), Voyage: Hellevoetsluis - Freetown, 1st Observer: J. Blom (Kapitein), Company: MAR, Other ship information: GEARMEERD MET 28 STUKKEN, BEMAND MET 150 KOPPEN.
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
